column4: Hey all - Novice user here.  I am running Ubuntu on my VPS but suddenly I cannot apt-get anything and even 'apt-get update' wont work because I get a bunch of errors back.  Here is a logfile:  http://www.pastebay.com/138810
Can someone tell me what I need to do?
Please don't flood; use http://paste.ubuntu.com to paste; don't use Enter as punctuation.
